body.name: Ｍａｉｈａｉｌ Maihail Computer Desk with Drawers, 47 inch Desk with 2 Drawers and Shelves, Office Desk with Storage, Desk with Storage Bag, Home Office desks with Drawers, Metal Frame for PC Laptop, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Enrich Storage Space】Compared with traditional desks, this computer desk adds three drawers, a side storage pocket and 1-tier open shelf for storage . The bottom drawer can accommodate A4 file folders. The extra storage space can more effectively organize the work space in the home or office.

【More Detailed Design】The back of the desktop is designed with a gap for the charging cable to pass through, so that the desk with drawers for bedroom can be completely attached to the wall. Adjustable feet adjust the height of the table legs individually to accommodate uneven floors.

【Solid Structure】This office desk with storage adopts a structure combining metal frame and wood. This design satisfies both lightness and stability. Table surface has certain water resistance and wear resistance, so it is very durable.

【More Options】This home office desk is available in three colors and three sizes. Fully meet the needs of different scenarios.The drawers of this desk can be installed on either side of the computer desk, but please confirm the installation position before assembly.

【Product Parameters】Desktop Dimension: 47.24"x 19.69", Desk Height: 29.13". Package Size: 35.2"x 22.4" x 4.5"; net weight:34.28lb; gross weight:37.37lb. Installation is simple. The package comes with graphic installation instructions and necessary installation tools. If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free tocontact us.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Materials. Solid and steady.
reviews.reviewText: I think this desk gives great bang for the buck. The wood is very pretty and just the right amount of thickness. The metal pieces are also thick, well made, and screw together smoothly. Although the directions are not the easiest to follow, a major plus is that they use the same size screw for almost everything. The only slight downside to this desk is that I did not realize the file drawer fits in sideways. To get into my files, I have to take out the whole (light, nicely sized) drawer and put it on top of the desk to sort through it. It's worth the trouble though, to have such a little desk that fits perfectly into my small room. I'm mentioning the downsides because everything is equal or better quality than the product description implies. I also find the whole thing quite attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honest Objective Design review
reviews.reviewText: See photo. Thought I'd take a shot in the middle of set up. This desk is great for small spaces. Very light weight and easy to assemble. The fabric drawers help keep it simple. The paint appears durable. There is some flexibility in the set up. Pay attention to the actual measurements. The desk has a bit less depth than other desks that are 59 inches wide but I like that for my space. I was looking for an unobtrusive desk and this is great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice desk. Steel frame is very sturdy. Wood grain is nice-not cheap looking. I needed a file drawer, so this was perfect. All in all, money well spent. I would like to add, the instructions were clear and well written.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice! frame is sturdy but drawers are made of cloth
reviews.reviewText: Nice small enough desk, easy to lift and assemble. the drawers are like a weird bendy material and cloth, not the sturdiest. good enough for basic home office/student storage but not good for heavy duty stuff (i.e heavy books). I like the drawers and skinny but long desk shape .One of the support rods/file hangers in my drawer came broken but it was okay since I didnt need it. Please note the bottom drawer is not deep enough to store folders vertically ( only horizontally i.e. manilla folders). I like the sleek appearance, color, and size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were pretty easy, some parts I had to redo a few times to get right; primarily because I needed to have the drawers on the right side, not left. Nonetheless, the “wood” like finish on the table was really nice. As is in pictures. Would recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted an inexpensive and narrow desk. This one is perfect. The quality is great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Buyer beware the description states that the drawers are made of wood and steel however, they are made of very flimsy cardboard. Had to return because the drawers could only hold very light things like made a pen! This is what we call bait and switch in America and is completely illegal! So just know if you’re buying this product the drawers are completely useless and tough to open! Completely ridiculous and cheap. Too bad too because had they lined it with even a light plywood and charged another $20.00 it would have been a phenomenal desk! What a shame that this company and Amazon has the need to lie to their customers in order to sell their products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neatly Organized And Easily Accessible, here are my notes…
reviews.reviewText: This item has been with me for a very short time.I decided to order the Maihail Office Desk with 2 Drawers, 59” Desk with Shelves because it perfectly suited my needs for a functional and stylish workspace. The two drawers provide ample storage for all my office supplies, keeping them neatly organized and easily accessible. Plus, the additional shelves on the desk offer extra space to display decorative items or keep reference books within arm's reach. I was particularly drawn to the vintage design of this desk, as it adds character and charm to my home office setup. The sturdy construction ensures its durability over time, and the spacious desktop allows me to spread out my work materials comfortably. Assembling the desk was a breeze thanks to clear instructions and well-packaged parts.I hope you find this review helpful.
